bitarray_utils module

bitarray_utils.bitarray_to_uint(bit_array: bitarray.bitarray) → int
bitarray_utils.get_bit_width(size) → int
bitarray_utils.test_bitarray_to_int()

simple tests to verify if uint to bitarray and reverse conversions work

bitarray_utils.uint_to_bitarray(x: int, bit_width=None) → bitarray.bitarray

converts an unsigned into to bits. if bit_width is provided then data is converted accordingly
